philosophy: Start lenient to avoid blocking work, tighten based on empirical evidence of quality issues slipping through

documentation.rationale: Very lenient - documentation SDs focus on clarity and completeness, not technical architecture

infrastructure.rationale: Lenient - internal tooling, not customer-facing. Focus on technical robustness.

feature.rationale: Moderate - customer-facing work requires balance of user value and technical quality

database.rationale: Slightly stricter - data integrity critical, but not blocking at this phase

history.reason: Initial baseline - slightly stricter for data safety

security.rationale: Stricter - security critical, but avoid false positives that block legitimate work

history.reason: Initial baseline - stricter but not blocking

unknown.rationale: Default when sd_type is not set. Moderate baseline.

increase_threshold.condition: >3 quality issues from SDs that passed Russian Judge in last 4 weeks
increase_threshold.example: If database SDs have 4 migration failures in production despite passing at 65%, increase to 70-75%

keep_threshold.condition: <1 quality issue AND pass rate >70% in last 4 weeks
keep_threshold.reasoning: Threshold is working well - keeps quality high without blocking work

decrease_threshold.condition: Pass rate <50% AND no quality issues in last 4 weeks
decrease_threshold.reasoning: Threshold too strict - blocking legitimate work without quality benefit

metrics_to_track: Quality issues that slip through (GitHub issues, UAT failures)
False positives (low scores for good-quality SDs)
monitoring.review_query: SELECT * FROM v_ai_quality_tuning_recommendations WHERE assessments_last_4_weeks >= 5 ORDER BY sd_type;

notes: These thresholds represent PHASE 1: Lenient Baseline
After 2-4 weeks of monitoring, adjust based on empirical data
Target pass rates: 60-85% (not too lenient, not too strict)
Quality > Quantity: Better to let questionable work through and learn than block legitimate work
Russian Judge is ADVISORY (logs but doesn't block) - thresholds inform but don't enforce
See plan: /home/rickf/.claude/plans/peaceful-wobbling-gadget.md for full implementation strategy
future_enhancements: Per-content-type thresholds (PRD vs User Story within same sd_type)
Time-decay weighting (recent assessments weighted more heavily)
Automatic threshold adjustments based on v_ai_quality_tuning_recommendations
A/B testing different thresholds on parallel SDs
Machine learning to predict optimal thresholds based on SD characteristics
